short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send album information to Vestaboard from a Discogs album page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly send information from a Discogs album page to your Vestaboard! You'll need your Vestaboard's API Key, API Secret, and Subscription ID.
For more information, visit Vestaboard's website at web.vestaboard.com.
